textwelcome: The American Academy of Pediatrics suggests limiting screen time to one hour a day for children aged 2 to 5, with high-quality content and parental supervision.
textdata: Enter the child's name to create a more immersive experience. This will allow us to tailor the content and make it more relevant to their age and interests.
greetingcomplement: I hope you're ready to play
textdash: Time to have fun! Choose a category to start playing and learning.
donationMessage: Your donation helps more children learn and have fun with Pimo. Contribute to the growth of our app and make each day special. Thank you for your support!
desclang: Change the language for both text and voice. This can help your child start or take their first steps in another language.
descname: Personalize the app experience by adding or changing the name of your child that you entered at the start.
nameokdesc: If this name is incorrect or you wish to make any changes, click here.
namenot: You have not entered a name yet.
namenotdesc: Please enter a name to personalize the experience.
titledesc1: If you have suggestions, complaints, or concerns, please contact me via my email:
footer: This app was created with much love for my dear son Renato. Every detail has been thoughtfully designed to provide a fun and educational experience. I hope this app brings joy and learning to many children and parents, just as it has for us.
categorywelcome2: Discover everything you need to know about
categorywelcome3: It's the perfect time to explore
